title: The Band concert
creator_credit: Walt Disney and Walt Disney Animation Studios
brief_description: Despite interference from a bee, a noisy Donald Duck playing “Turkey in the Straw”, and a full scale whirlwind, Mickey’s band doggedly performs the “William Tell Overture”. This was the first Mickey Mouse cartoon to use technicolor and is considered to be one of the Disney studios best.
